alert.note: Alert for Lake; Volusia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 23 at 9:51AM EDT until October 26 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... St Johns River Near Astor affecting Volusia and Lake Counties. For the St. Johns River...including Cocoa 9w, Above Lake Harney, Sanford, Deland, Astor...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...St Johns River near Astor. * WHEN...Until Thursday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM EDT Monday the stage was 2.5 feet. - Bankfull stage is 2.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:30 AM EDT Monday was 2.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Thursday morning and continue falling to 2.0 feet Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 2.3 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (8 am) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat St Johns River Astor 2.3 2.5 Mon 9 am 2.4 2.3 2.2 2.1 2.0 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 100 AM EDT.
